name: A tale of other worlds and demons(demo)
name_original: A tale of other worlds and demons(demo)
description:
A tale of other world and demons is a free fantasy, otome visual novel with some sc-fi elements currently in development.

Starting in a medieval setting where knowledge about different worlds isn't uncommon the heroine, Faery,  a future countess to be,  meets Astrifer, a scientist from another world. Despite some minor obstacles and complaints from her recently appointed guard Gawain her dream of travelling different worlds is fullfiled. During travels they meet a new companion, Leon, a kind stranger from a modern world who easily accepts  the concept of other worlds. Soon she comes to realize that travelling isn't just all fun and games  and along the way she realizes the true nature of her world and uncovers hidden facts about herself...

Main characters

Faery(heroine)

  • future countess to be from a medieval-like world
  • 20 years old
  • loves strange things

Astrifer

  • scientist from a steampunk world
  • 27 years old
  • science is his life

Gawain

  •  royal knight from Faery's world
  • 22 years old
  • wears his heart on his sleeve

Leon

  • judge from a modern world
  • 30 years old
  • otaku

Game features:

Heroine's name can be changed

Around 8000 words in the demo

3 unique routes(since the game is still in develoment the demo covers only a part of the common route)

CG gallery will be added at a later point of development(some CGs are missing in the demo, they are still work in progress)

The game will have 10 endings

Team:

LadyBex - story and programming

Delirijumbaklave - art

Music: Royalty free music used listed in the about section of the game.

This is our first project Visual Novel project ever, comments and constructive criticism are very welcome.

Contact: silvergirl545@gmail.com
